providedByDescription: Kim was senior to Josh but didn't manage Josh directly
recommendation:
I had the pleasure of working with Josh for over 2 years at KCL, where I was directly involved in his hiring. Josh left a lasting impression on me right from our very first interview. He displayed a unique combination of humility and ambition when discussing the job and his career aspirations. Striking a balance between eagerness to learn and fearlessness to tackle new challenges can be a rare quality, and Josh consistently demonstrated this throughout his two years on my team.

Josh not only excelled in delivering on his assigned projects and features but also displayed a remarkable ability to diversify his skill set. He proactively sought feedback from his manager and embraced tasks outside his comfort zone without hesitation. This growth mindset, coupled with his unwavering determination, proved to be invaluable to our team's success.

Moreover, one of Josh's most outstanding attributes is his exceptional collaboration with stakeholders across the organization. Josh made working with the Engineering team a seamless and enjoyable experience. He was approachable, communicative, and consistently delivered high-quality work on time. I frequently received positive feedback from his colleagues in other departments about their positive experiences collaborating with Josh. These are traits I deeply respect and are not always easy to find. 

I wholeheartedly recommend Josh for any role where his talents, collaborative nature, and unwavering determination can shine. It was an honor to have had the opportunity to work with Josh, and I have no doubt that he will continue to grow and make significant contributions to any company fortunate enough to have him on board.

Josh is one of the top engineers I've ever had the pleasure of working with. He's also one of the top coworkers as well. He's smart and sharp, yet kind and upbeat; also hard-working and ambitious, a rare set of qualities for an engineer. 

I had the pleasure of working with Josh as his leader for over 2 years at The Krazy Coupon Lady. 
Josh is a go-getter. He has an outstanding balance of seeking behavior and autonomy. He really cares about his work, and the passion he puts into it shows through constantly. 

Josh always goes above and beyond because he genuinely cares about the product he is producing. From a manager's perspective, he's the best kind of employee to have- he's always looking to leave the areas he works in better than when he got there. He's always willing to help out a fellow coworker. Josh is constantly showing genuine kindness to those with whom he works, and it leaves you feeling great to have interacted with him.

Josh comes into the room with unmatched positivity and a genuinely open mind and ears. Josh was truly the development leader on our app team.

I recommend Josh to any hiring manager looking to "skip the line" and find that once-in-a-lifetime engineer to bolster your team with both development power and a great personality!
recommendationHighlight: ...one of the top engineers I've ever had the pleasure of working with...

recommendation:
It was an absolute pleasure working alongside Josh on the mobile app team. His combination of technical expertise, crystal-clear communication, and a tenacious problem-solving spirit made him an invaluable asset.

Josh successfully tackled complex challenges with elegance and efficiency, his dedication ensuring unwavering stability and top-notch performance for our app. But his contributions went beyond lines of code. Josh had a deep understanding of the user experience, and his unwavering focus on keeping users happy was truly admirable.

His communication skills were equally impressive. Whether presenting intricate technical concepts to stakeholders or brainstorming with designers, Josh's ability to convey ideas clearly and concisely made him a crucial bridge between teams. He was also a true team player, always open to feedback and eager to lend a hand wherever needed.

Josh's positive attitude and collaborative spirit were contagious. He brought an infectious enthusiasm to every project, and his easygoing nature fostered a truly productive and creative environment.

Thanks to Josh's dedication, our mobile app consistently improved. He played a pivotal role in enhancing its stability, performance, and user satisfaction. I have no doubt that he will continue to excel in his career, and I wholeheartedly recommend him to any team seeking a skilled, dedicated, and collaborative developer.
recommendationHighlight: ...Josh successfully tackled complex challenges with elegance and efficiency...

providedByDescription: Shandy worked with Josh but on different teams
recommendation:
Iâ€™m elated to provide a wholehearted recommendation for Josh, a mobile developer I had the pleasure of working with at The Krazy Coupon Lady. Josh consistently demonstrated a remarkable level of technical brilliance in every aspect of his work.

Josh has an exceptional ability to translate complex technical requirements into efficient and elegant mobile solutions. He consistently delivered high-quality work, showcasing a deep understanding of mobile development frameworks and a keen eye for detail.

What truly sets Josh apart is his collaborative spirit. He was not only approachable but also actively engaged in fostering a positive team environment. Josh consistently contributed valuable insights, making him one of the most collaborative team members I have had the pleasure of working with. His willingness to share knowledge and expertise greatly enhanced the overall productivity and success of our projects.
recommendationHighlight: ...a deep understanding of mobile development frameworks and a keen eye for detail...
